DOC.brief_summary: Today 's obesogenic environment , favor behavioral choice lead excess energy intake expenditure , consequently weight gain . Intervention strategies harness body 's appetite satiety regulating signal could provide effective mean counter excessive energy intake . The purpose study investigate whether vegetable oil emulsion ( Olibra ) would result weight loss associate reduction food intake .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Olibra : A 12 Week Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: 71 healthy subject enrol ( 60 female , 11 male ; Age : 18 - 60 year , BMI 25 - 40 kg/m2 ) two-phased , randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind , parallel trial . During 12-week period , Olibra compare placebo ( milk fat ) . Food intake testing conduct three day anthropometric data collect 7 day . Key outcome measure , body weight , body composition , energy intake , appetite rating .
